mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noNum, userId, noSubject, noContent, noCreated, noHitCount, noType) VALUES(#{noNum}, #{userId}, #{noSubject}, #{noContent}, SYSDATE, 0, #{noType})
mapper.select: SELECT n.noNum, noType, n.userId, userNick, noSubject, noHitCount, TO_CHAR(noCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') noCreated, NVL(noFileCount,0) noFileCount FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=n.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT noNum, COUNT(*) noFileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY noNum ) f ON n.noNum=f.noNum WHERE noType = 1 ORDER BY n.noNum DESC

SELECT n.noNum, noType, n.userId, userNick, noSubject, noHitCount, noCreated, NVL(noFileCount,0) noFileCount FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=n.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT noNum, COUNT(*) noFileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY noNum ) f ON n.noNum=f.noNum
ORDER BY n.noNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=n.userId
SELECT noNum, n.userId, userNick, noSubject, noContent, noCreated, noHitCount, noType FROM notice n JOIN member1 ON m.userId=n.userId where noNum=#{noNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeFile(noFileNum, noNum, noSaveFileName, noOriginalFileName, noFileSize) VALUES(noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{noNum}, #{noSaveFileName}, #{noOriginalFileName}, #{noFileSize})
